fileExtensionPreference.description: calling latexindent.pl to operate on myfile (without extension) is fine, and in which case the file extensions from this field will be used in order

.*.description: integer, specifying the order in which latexindent.pl will search for myfile ending with this extension

backupExtension.description: when the -w, --overwrite switch is active, a back-up file is created with this extension

onlyOneBackUp.description: when the -w, --overwrite switch is active, the default is to create a back-up file for each call to latexindent.pl. Changing onlyOneBackUp to 1 means that only one back-up file is created

maxNumberOfBackUps.description: when the -w, --overwrite switch is active, the default is to create a back-up file for each call to latexindent.pl. This field sets the maximum number of back-up files

cycleThroughBackUps.description: when the -w, --overwrite switch is active, back-up files can be overwritten in order; see also maxNumberOfBackUps

logFilePreferences.description: latexindent.pl will write logging information to indent.log; the appearance of some of the information can be customised

showEveryYamlRead.description: 0/1, binary switch to show every YAML file's settings in indent.log

showAmalgamatedSettings.description: 0/1, binary switch to show the overall/amalgamated settings in indent.log

showDecorationStartCodeBlockTrace.description: 0/1, binary switch to show decorations at *start* of code block in indent.log when -t, -tt switches active

showDecorationFinishCodeBlockTrace.description: 0/1, binary switch to show decorations at *finish* of code block in indent.log when -t, -tt switches active

showGitHubInfoFooter.description: 0/1, binary switch to show GitHub information in footer of indent.log

Dumper.description: options to be passed to the Dumper module; most helpful when -t, -tt active.

verbatimEnvironments.description: specify the names of verbatim environments in this field

.*.description: 0/1, binary switch to mean don't look for/look for this *environment*

verbatimCommands.description: specify the names of verbatim *commands* in this field

.*.description: 0/1, binary switch to mean don't look for/look for this *command*

noIndentBlock.description: specify the names of *noIndentBlock* in this field

.*.description: 0/1, binary switch to mean don't look for/look for this *noIndentBlock*

fileContentsEnvironments.description: specify the names of *filecontents* in this field

.*.description: 0/1, binary switch to mean don't look for/look for this *filecontents* environment

indentPreamble.description: 0/1, binary switch to instruct latexindent.pl to operate on preamble or not

lookForPreamble.description: list of extensions detailing which files latexindent.pl should look for preamble

.*.description: 0/1, binary switch for preamble search for this file type

preambleCommandsBeforeEnvironments.description: 0/1, binary switch to instruct latexindent.pl to search for commands before environments in preamble

defaultIndent.description: default indentation, needs to be specified as horizontal space

removeTrailingWhitespace.description: remove horizontal space at the *end* of lines

beforeProcessing.description: 0/1, binary switch to remove horizontal space *before* indenting

afterProcessing.description: 0/1, binary switch to remove horizontal space *after* indenting

lookForAlignDelims.description: list of names of code blocks detailing that latexindent.pl should align at delimiters

delims.description: 0/1, binary switch to look for delimiters

multiColumnGrouping.description: 0/1, binary switch to group alignment under \multicolumn command

alignRowsWithoutMaxDelims.description: 0/1, binary switch to align rows without the maximum number of delimiters

spacesBeforeAmpersand.description: integer detailing number of spaces *before* delimiter

spacesAfterAmpersand.description: integer detailing number of spaces *after* delimiter

dontMeasure.description: entries not to be measured in the alignment routine

this.description: string containing the cell *not* to be measured

regex.description: regular expression to match cell or row

lookForChildCodeBlocks.description: 0/1. binary switch to look for child code blocks

indentAfterItems.description: specify the names of environments that contain items

middle.description: optional: regular expression containing the *middle* part

lookForThis.description: optional 0/1, binary switch detailing look for this or not. Default is 1 if not specified

indentAfterThisHeading.description: 0/1, binary switch to look for heading or not
